successes.title: Buhel Tech Sunglasses + Headphones: No Earphones Or Wires!
successes.description: BUHEL SG05 Bluetooth Bone Conduction Glasses Communicate With Smartphones, Electronic Devices, Tablets, Mp3 Players, GPS, iPhone, etc.

Pledges.description: A printable DIY docking station & speaker for you to listen to your music!

If you cannot contribute to the campaign for any reason, this original Buhel Sound System is FREE, just share our Kickstarter campaign with your friends and send us an e-mail at buhelKS@gmail.com and we will add you to the list of people who will receive the Buhel Speaker at the end of the campaign! :)
